mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_BOARD ORDER BY BNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD VALUES( seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, null)
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, updatedate=sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rn, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM<=#{pageNum}*#{amount}) WHERE rn>(#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
